org.reprap
Class Preferences

java.lang.Object
  org.reprap.Preferences

public class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object

A single centralised repository of the current preference settings. This also implements (almost) a singleton for easy global access. If there are no current preferences fallback distribution defaults are used.
